alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bristol, northeastern Newport, northeastern Kent, southeastern Providence and Bristol Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Providence, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Providence, Fall River, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, East Providence, Dartmouth, Johnston, Bristol, Attleboro, Somerset, Portsmouth, Barrington, Swansea, Tiverton, Westport, Seekonk, Rehoboth, Warren, and Little Compton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence
